title: Font-Bots
content:
Check out the [Font-Bots](http://web.archive.org/web/20130801182331/http:/www.invdr.com/2006/12/font-bots/) from INVDR (Helvetica, Futura and Akzidenz Grotesk):

[![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130801182331im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FontBots.png)](http://web.archive.org/web/20130801182331/http:/www.invdr.com/2006/12/font-bots/)

Now available on posters, T-shirts, iPod skins, and laptop covers.
